name: Amazon Basics 5-Blade MotionSphere Razor Refills for Men with Dual Lubrication and Precision Beard Trimmer, 8 Cartridges (Fits Amazon Basics Razor Handles only) (Previously Solimo)
short_description: 5-blade MotionSphere razor refill cartridge (8-pack)
Hypoallergenic lubricating strips with Vitamin E to help reduce skin irritation
Double coated blade edge with anti-clog design for quick rinse
Beard trimmer for shaving goatee, sideburns, and under nose
Cartridges fit Amazon Basics Razor Handles only; does not fit other brands
Alexa voice shopping enabled: to place your next order, just say, “Alexa, reorder Amazon Basics Razor Refills”
If you like Gillette Fusion ProGlide Razors, we invite you to try Amazon Basics 5-Blade Razors for Men
Packaging may vary from images shown; this was previously a Solimo product and is now a part of the Amazon Basics brand; the product is the exact same formulation, size, and quality
product_description: Includes eight Amazon Basics 5-Blade MotionSphere razor refill cartridges. INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Prepare: Wash your face with warm water to remove dirt and oils. Apply a pre-shave oil (optional). 2. Lather: Apply shaving cream or gel to your face using a brush or directly with your hands. 3. Shave: Use a razor to shave in the direction of hair growth, using short and light strokes, rinsing the razor frequently. For a closer shave, you can reapply shaving cream/gel and shave against the grain (opposite direction of hair growth). However, be cautious as this may increase the risk of skin irritation or ingrown hairs. 4. Soothe: Rinse your face, pat dry, and apply an aftershave lotion or balm to moisturize and soothe the skin. 5. Store: Shake off excess water after use and store your razor in a clean, dry place.

product_description: Gillette Fusion5 men's razor blade refills feature five antifriction blades for a shave you can barely feel, a Precision Trimmer for hard-to-reach places and for styling facial hair and blades that are spaced closely together for incredible comfort. The lubrication strip provides lubrication after the blades and fades when you are no longer getting an optimal shave. Included are 2 Gillette ProGlide refills to help upgrade your shave. ProGlide refills feature an enhanced lubrastrip (vs Fusion), and 5 of our best blades for a close shave. Concerned your Gillette handle won't fit? Both the Fusion5 and ProGlide blades fit all Gillette 5-blade razor handles. Also, each refill lasts up to a month of shaves, giving you the ability to customize your shave and get the most out of every blade.

product_description: Experience closeness and long-lasting comfort with the Fusion5 Power men’s razor blade refills. Featuring five sharp anti-friction blades for a shave you can barely feel, and a precision trimmer that makes shaving hard-to-reach areas such as under the nose and the sideburns easy. These razor blades for men are equipped with a Microfin Guard to gently smooth your skin before the blades and a microcomb that helps guide your hair to the blades. The simple yet effective blade stabilization maintains optimal blade spacing for comfort while allowing the blades to adjust to the contours of your face. The larger* lubrication strip provides a smoother glide, and with each blade refill providing up to 20 shaves** you’re given long-lasting value. Concerned your Gillette handle won't fit? All Fusion5 razor blades fit all Gillette 5-blade razor handles (excluding GilletteLabs). Pairs perfectly with Gillette Fusion Ultra-Sensitive Shaving Gel for added protection from shaving irritation. (*vs previous Fusion5, **based on 3 shaves per week).

product_description: Amazon Basics 5-Blade MotionSphere Razor for Men features a multi pivot design to follow the contours of your face and a beard trimmer for shaving goatee, sideburns and under nose. The razor cartridge is hypoallergenic, includes a lubricating strip with vitamin E, and has an anti-clog design for quick rinse. To load refill cartridge, push razor handle into a cartridge as it sits in the dispenser until it clicks. Cartridges fit Amazon Basics Razor Handles only; does not fit other brands. INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Prepare: Wash your face with warm water to remove dirt and oils. Apply a pre-shave oil (optional). 2. Lather: Apply shaving cream or gel to your face using a brush or directly with your hands. 3. Shave: Use a razor to shave in the direction of hair growth, using short and light strokes, rinsing the razor frequently. For a closer shave, you can reapply shaving cream/gel and shave against the grain (opposite direction of hair growth). However, be cautious as this may increase the risk of skin irritation or ingrown hairs. 4. Soothe: Rinse your face, pat dry, and apply an aftershave lotion or balm to moisturize and soothe the skin. 5. Store: Shake off excess water after use and store your razor in a clean, dry place.

short_description: PROTECTION YOU CAN FEEL – Schick Hydro razor blade refills are designed with comfort coating for an easy glide and close shave, with Skin Guards on every blade that protect against irritation.
MAXIMUM COMFORT – Dermatologist-tested, our 5 blade razor refill has 7 Cushioning Gel Pools, enriched with Aloe and Pro-Vitamin B5, that hydrate and soothe skin for maximum comfort while you shave.
LONG-LASTING BLADES – Utilizing our most durable blades for a close, long-lasting shave, each Schick Hydro refill cartridge will get you an average of 18 shaves per cartridge.
FLIP BACK PRECISION EDGER – With a simple flip, this shaving razor transforms into a slim precision edger to help you create crisp lines and get at hard-to-reach places.
SCHICK HYDRO COMPATIBILITY – Any Schick Hydro refill cartridge is compatible with any Schick Hydro handle.
product_description: Enjoy a close, comfortable shave tailored specifically to guys with sensitive skin with the Schick Hydro Sensitive Razor Refills. Utilizing our most durable blades for a close, long-lasting shave, each Schick Hydro 5 refill cartridge will give you an average of 18 shaves per cartridge. These razors for men are designed with comfort coating for an easy glide and close shave, while Skin Guards on every blade protect against irritation. 7 Cushioning Gel Pools, enriched with Aloe and Pro-Vitamin B5, reduce friction and hydrate and soothe skin throughout each shave. Since our razor blades for men are dermatologist-tested and gentle enough for sensitive skin, shaving will become something your skin looks forward to. These razor heads even feature a unique Flip Back Precision Edger to help you create crisp lines and get at hard-to-reach places with the shaving blades.

product_description: Enjoy a close, comfortable shave tailored specifically to guys with sensitive skin with the Schick Hydro Sensitive Razor. Utilizing our most durable blades for a close, long-lasting shave, each razor cartridge can provide an average of 18 shaves per cartridge. These 5 blade razors for men are designed with comfort coating for an easy glide and close shave, while Skin Guards on every blade protect against irritation. 7 Cushioning Gel Pools, enriched with Aloe and Pro-Vitamin B5, reduce friction and hydrate and soothe skin throughout each shave. Since too much pressure can cause unnecessary nicks, cuts, and razor burn, we added a Shock Absorb razor handle to the Schick Hydro 5 that auto-adjusts, based on how you shave, to provide optimal pressure on your skin for a truly customized shave. To top it off, this Schick razor for men also features a unique Flip Back Precision Edger to help you create crisp lines and get at hard-to-reach places.

product_description: The Gillette ProGlide razor refills for men provide the iconic Gillette shave precision with comfort and style. The 5-bladed men's razor refills feature a larger* lubrication strip for added comfort and glide to your shave. This enhanced Lubrastrip also fades when you are no longer getting an optimal shave. The razor blade cartridges feature 5 anti-friction blades for a shave you can barely feel. Our simple yet effective blade stabilization maintains optimal blade spacing for comfort while allowing the blades to adjust to the contours of your face. The Precision Trimmer on the back is perfect for styling facial hair, especially in these hard-to-reach areas such as under the nose and the sideburns. With soft microfins that gently stretch your skin and a microcomb that helps guide your hair, these men's razor refills use our ultrasharp ProBlades for a close shave. Our ultra-sharp, anti-friction razor blades ensure a smooth shave. Each razor blade refill is engineered to last up to 20 shaves (*Vs. Fusion5), so you can get the most of every shave. Concerned your Gillette handle won't fit? All of our Gillette ProGlide razor blades fit all Gillette 5-blade razor handles (excluding GilletteLabs).
